column5: This cozyHoward Room is equipped with a king bed with a tempur-pedic mattress. The room has free Wi-Fi available as well as a flat screen HD-TV. You may wrap yourself in comfort with the spa robes you will find in the closet. An iron and ironing board is also in the room for your convenience.  The private bath is just across the hall and is well appointed with lush Turkish towels, toiletries, hair dryer, and magnifying make-up mirror.  This room will sleep up to two adults.
